name: Alien DNA Hunter 9000
description:
Epic Journey

My submission for Butterscotch Shenanijam 2019. Play as Hubert the alien on a quest to collect DNA from all lifeforms. Beware of powerful random-generated enemies and loot boxes!

Controls
  • WASD/ANALOG STICK - Move Hubert
  • SPACE/A - Jump
  • SHIFT/X - Fire Weapon
Ethical Surprise Mechanics

Fill the DNA meter by killing enemies. When the meter reaches 100%, you will unlock a loot box! Your reward will be a random weapon or a health pack that increases maximum health.

Achievements
  • Gameboy
  • Mozart
  • Totally Ethical Surprise Mechanics
  • Maverick
More Info!

Check out the devlog for continued development updates. You can also watch me create this game live on my Twitch Channel!
